page.title: 09PETS AND ANIMALS
page.content: In the local area most people have pets for company. In a survey I found that the most popular pet was a dog. All in all, my results read; 42 dogs, 11 cats, 8 horses,7 birds,7 gerbils, 6 hens,2 hamsters,2 goats,2 rabbits, and 1 tortoise. This shows that if an animal can show affection then the animal is frequently found in homes throughout the area. No-one said they had goldfish. I think this is because goldfish cannot show their affection as well as other animals. I also think the reason dogs are so popular is because they are useful as guide dogs, guard dogs and a source of company.
